trans-unit.source: Contains a collection of <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> objects.
Creates an empty <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMappingCollection"></xref>.
Adds a <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> object to the collection.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_DataColumnMapping" name="DataColumnMapping" href=""></xref> object to add to the collection.
The index of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_DataColumnMapping" name="DataColumnMapping" href=""></xref> object that was added to the collection.
The object passed in was not a <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> object.
Adds a <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> object to the collection when given a source column name and a <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> column name.
The case-sensitive name of the source column to map to.
The name, which is not case-sensitive, of the <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> column to map to.
The <xref uid="langword_csharp_DataColumnMapping" name="DataColumnMapping" href=""></xref> object that was added to the collection.
Copies the elements of the specified <xref:System.Array> to the end of the collection.
The <xref:System.Array> to add to the collection.
Copies the elements of the specified <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> array to the end of the collection.
The array of <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> objects to add to the collection.
Removes all <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> objects from the collection.
Gets a value indicating whether a <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> object with the given <xref:System.Object> exists in the collection.
An <xref:System.Object> that is the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref>.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the collection contains the specified <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> object; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The object passed in was not a <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> object.
Gets a value indicating whether a <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> object with the given source column name exists in the collection.
The case-sensitive source column name of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> object.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if collection contains a <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> object with the specified source column name; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Copies the elements of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMappingCollection"></xref> to the specified array.
An <xref:System.Array> to which to copy <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMappingCollection"></xref> elements.
The starting index of the array.
Copies the elements of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMappingCollection"></xref> to the specified <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> array.
A <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> array to which to copy the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMappingCollection"></xref> elements.
The zero-based index in the `array` at which copying begins.
Gets the number of <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> objects in the collection.
The number of items in the collection.
Gets the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> object with the specified <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> column name.
The name, which is not case-sensitive, of the <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> column to find.
The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> object with the specified <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> column name.

Gets a <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> for the specified <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMappingCollection"></xref>, source column name, and <xref href="System.Data.MissingMappingAction"></xref>.
If the <xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping> exists in the collection, it is returned.

If the <xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping> does not exist in the collection, for a given <xref:System.Data.MissingMappingAction>, the following actions occur: |MissingMappingAction|Action Taken| |--------------------------|------------------| |`Passthrough`|Creates a <xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping> with the specified source column name as both the source column name and the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> column name.

This <xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping> is not added to the collection.| |`Error`|An <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is generated if the specified column mapping is missing.| |`Ignore`|Gets a null value.|
The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMappingCollection"></xref>.
The case-sensitive source column name to find.
One of the <xref href="System.Data.MissingMappingAction"></xref> values.
A <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> object.
The mappingAction parameter was set to , and no mapping was specified.
A static method that returns a <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"></xref> object without instantiating a <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMappingCollection"></xref> object.
The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMappingCollection"></xref>.
The case-sensitive column name from a data source.
The data type for the column being mapped.
An instance of <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>.
One of the <xref href="System.Data.MissingMappingAction"></xref> values.
Determines the action to take when the existing <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> schema does not match incoming data.
A <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"></xref> object.
Gets an enumerator that can iterate through the collection.
An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> that can be used to iterate through the collection.
Gets the location of the specified <xref:System.Object> that is a <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> within the collection.
An <xref:System.Object> that is the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> to find.
The zero-based location of the specified <xref:System.Object> that is a <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> within the collection.
Gets the location of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> with the specified source column name.
The case-sensitive name of the source column.
The zero-based location of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> with the specified case-sensitive source column name.
Gets the location of the specified <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> with the given <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> column name.
The name, which is not case-sensitive, of the data set column to find.

The zero-based location of the specified <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> with the given <xref uid="langword_csharp_DataSet" name="DataSet" href=""></xref> column name, or -1 if the <xref uid="langword_csharp_DataColumnMapping" name="DataColumnMapping" href=""></xref> object does not exist in the collection.
Inserts a <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> object into the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMappingCollection"></xref> at the specified index.
The zero-based index of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> object to insert.
The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> object.
Inserts a <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> object into the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMappingCollection"></xref> at the specified index.
The zero-based index of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> object to insert.
The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> object.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> object at the specified index.
The zero-based index of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> object to find.
The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> object at the specified index.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> object with the specified source column name.
The case-sensitive name of the source column.
The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> object with the specified source column name.
Removes the specified <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> from the collection.
The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> to remove.
Removes the <xref:System.Object> that is a <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> from the collection.
The <xref:System.Object> that is the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> to remove.
The object specified was not a <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> object.
The object specified is not in the collection.
Removes the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> object with the specified index from the collection.
The zero-based index of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> object to remove.
There is no <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> object with the specified index.
Removes the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> object with the specified source column name from the collection.
The case-sensitive source column name.
There is no <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> object with the specified source column name.
Gets a value that indicates whether access to the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> is synchronized (thread safe).
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMappingCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
For more information, see <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A>.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if access to the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMappingCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
For more information, see <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>.
An object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.
Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.Collections.IList> has a fixed size.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMappingCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
For more information, see <xref:System.Collections.IList.IsFixedSize%2A>.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Collections.IList> has a fixed size; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.Collections.IList> is read-only.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMappingCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
For more information, see <xref:System.Collections.IList.IsReadOnly%2A>.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Collections.IList> is read-only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets the element at the specified index.
The zero-based index of the element to get or set.
The element at the specified index.

Adds a <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> object to the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMappingCollection"></xref> by using the source column and <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> column names.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMappingCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Data.IColumnMappingCollection> interface.
For more information, see <xref:System.Data.IColumnMappingCollection.Add%2A>.
The case-sensitive name of the source column.
The name of the <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> column.
The ColumnMapping object that was added to the collection.
Gets the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> object that has the specified <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> column name.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMappingCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Data.IColumnMappingCollection> interface.
For more information, see <xref:System.Data.IColumnMappingCollection.GetByDataSetColumn%2A>.
The name, which is not case-sensitive, of the <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> column to find.
The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> object that has the specified <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> column name.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Data.IColumnMapping"></xref> object with the specified <xref uid="langword_csharp_SourceColumn" name="SourceColumn" href=""></xref> name.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMappingCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Data.IColumnMappingCollection> interface.
For more information, see <xref:System.Data.IColumnMappingCollection.Item%2A>.
Index of the element.
The <xref uid="langword_csharp_IColumnMapping" name="IColumnMapping" href=""></xref> object with the specified <xref uid="langword_csharp_SourceColumn" name="SourceColumn" href=""></xref> name.
